page.title: 15HOME LIFE
page.content: Joane Liggins, Rhyddings High School My typical Monday begins at about 7.3O. I get up, woken by the alarm, get dressed and have my breakfast, usually Rice Krispies. My mum is always downstairs making my packed lunch, or taking my dog Jemma for a walk. I set off for school about 8.3O. I walk down Fife Street, down Exchange Street, cut across the field along Farfield Street and down Haworth Street. I get to the North Block of Rhyddings High School at about 8.55. I read through registration then go to my next lesson. The bell for break goes at lO.3O. Usually I mess around in the yard during break. After my next double lesson dinnertime bell goes. I go to my grandma's and get there about l2.lO. I have my dinner, feed the stray cats my grandma keeps. There are 3 kittens and 4 fully grown
